title: Flor do Grao
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Organic, Buffet, Delivery, Take-out, Brazilian
description: A vegetarian cafe upstairs and a vegetarian organic store downstairs. Cafe offers daily lunches and light dinners with vegan options. The 100% organic store sells vegetarian and vegan products, including fresh fruits and vegetables. Cafe serves a lunch buffet and in the afternoon serves snacks, juices and acai. Store is open Mon-Sun 8am-8:45pm.
